TeamÂ¶

History of the Project

MRF-CRBLoss was started at the Center for Data Science at the New-York University. The goal was to design an innovative deep learning approach to estimate biophysical parameters from Magnetic Resonance Fingerprinting data.

Team Members

Post-doctoral reseacher at NYU
